DataElement.preferredName: Causality Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity Foci Date and Time Range ISO21090.IVL.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The judgment of relatedness between an adverse event and an activity or observation result. The time period in which the observation result is held to be true.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Causality Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity Foci Date and Time Range
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The principle that a relationship exists between a primary entity A, or cause, and the occurrence of a secondary entity B, or effect.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Causality Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The principle that a relationship exists between a primary entity A, or cause, and the occurrence of a secondary entity B, or effect.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: The principle that a relationship exists between a primary entity A, or cause, and the occurrence of a secondary entity B, or effect.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

Concepts.definition: Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.
An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
